Detailed Description

Class definitions of csimClass , csimFieldInfo , csimClassInfo , and csimClassInfoDB.

#include <string.h>

Classes

    Holds information about a class like name, description and field informations. More...

    A database/dictionary of all classes with accessable fields. More...

Defines

  • #define READONLY   0
    Acces ID of read only fields.
  • #define READWRITE   1
    Acces ID of read-writable fields.
  • #define DO_REGISTERING
    Macro which should be put into the class definition of a class for which one wants accessable fields.
